Chinese_Sentence:
My dog loves to play fetch.
我的狗喜欢玩接球。
Wǒ de gǒu xǐhuan wán jiēqiú.
My ____ loves to play fetch.
我的____喜欢玩接球。
Wǒ de ____ xǐhuan wán jiēqiú.

The cute puppy wagged its tail.
那只可爱的小狗摇了摇尾巴。
Nà zhī kě'ài de xiǎo gǒu yáole yáo wěiba.
The cute ____ wagged its tail.

Nà zhī kě'ài de ____ yáole yáo wěiba.

My dog will bark at strangers.

Wǒ de gǒu huì duìzhe mòshēngrén jiào.

Always put a leash on your dog when going for a walk.
遛狗时一定要给你的狗戴上狗链。
Liù gǒu shí yīdìng yào gěi nǐ de gǒu dài shàng gǒu liàn.

The dog wagged its tail happily.
狗高兴地摇着尾巴。
Gǒu gāoxìng de yáozhe wěiba.
The dog wagged its ____ happily.

My dog offered its paw for a handshake.
我的狗伸出爪子跟我握手。
Wǒ de gǒu shēnchū zhuǎzi gēn wǒ wòshǒu.

Bié wàngle wèi gǒu.
